website_summaries.verdict: JBL's new top-end model in its "value" E-Series Bluetooth headphone line delivers solid sound and a comfortable fit for the price.
pros: The JBL E55BT is an attractively designed over-ear Bluetooth headphone that's relatively comfortable, sounds decent and works reliably
It folds up and flat and has decent battery life
cons: A bit of treble push, no carrying case included

customer_reviews.title: Does not play nicely with my 2017 MacBook Pro 13"
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have good sound quality and they block out a lot of ambient noise. Admittedly they don't compare to set of studio level headphones, but for home use where perfect reproduction isn't a must and you don't want to spend a fortune they're great. My only real complaint is that they REALLY don't get along with my 2017 MacBook Pro 13". For some reason whenever they connect they have a really rough sound that stutters and breaks in and out. Occasionally the problem seems to resolve itself and the audio sounds fine, but the vast majority of the time this issue makes listening via my laptop near impossible (will update this review if apple software update fixes issue).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Just OK, look elsewhere for better JBL
customer_reviews.text: This has a clear sound, a bit too much treble, a bit too little bass. The construction is pretty cheap. I own the Live series, which is significantly better quality (and more expensive). I returned there because I didn't have confidence that they would last.
customer_reviews.author: The Gun

customer_reviews.title: Nice to find such a solid set at such a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent overall sound quality, it is very balanced with excellent but not that overly fake bass. CLEAN midrange without muddiness and treble without clashing distortion. That's all my average sound quality expertise can convey but hope that provides a good idea. Good battery life, comfortable for an on-ear style. Very nice to find it here for about 1/3rd of it's original launch price. Only downsides are no APT-X for low latency so very slight lip sync issues when using with a TV and earpieces do get a little warm over time. But for this considered a mid-range brand name set, and it's competitors don't have APT-X either in this price range, so not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brown

customer_reviews.title: fits comfortably. great
customer_reviews.text: No gimmicks, expensive. Does everything one would expect perfectly. No bluetooth hiss, no issues bluetoothing into a pc. fits comfortably. great sound
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING and Inexpensive Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. The sound is wonderful. I actually ordered this blue pair because I stole the teal ones my husband bought. My ears hurt easily, but these do not make them hurt. I love the bluetooth, of course. My one criticism of the design would be that the on button for bluetooth is on the back, so if you are laying your head down and you move it too much you risk turning the headphones off. Easy solution - wear them backwards! The quality for price is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, honestly.
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding headphones for all of two months. The Right headphone has lost it's sound quite to the left. There isn't a button for equalizers like on the Charge 4. For $85 this is a joke of a product. My 4 year old $30 skull candy headphones still hold the same great quality as brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Stormes

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I only use this while watching Youtube videos. Pairs every time to my computer. The sound is decent. Once you figure out the size adjustment, you can wear this about 60 to 90 mins max. My ears get kinda warm wearing these. The battery life is outstanding. I used it 2-3 hours a day for a week before it needs another charge. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation feature is great, the headphones are very comfortable and holds well against my ears. The music gets loud but it's not too over powering. It's perfect for me because I don't like alot of base. Update : the cord that comes with headphone dose not work!!! Left side you don't hear nothing out of it!!! Beware when you by. Seems used to me! Have no way to return it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney b.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the great price!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second pair of these headphones, I've had the other ones for 3+ years and they still work! The material on the inside of the ear piece has begun to fall apart and flake off, which isn't ideal, so I bought the second pair to wear while I'm at work. I still use the older pair at home though.
customer_reviews.author: SaintPendulous

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my dude because I broke his Beats. He put them on and basically hasn’t taken them off since and says the battery life was better than his old set! I tried them when I meditated to see if they’d block out sound and they work insanely well.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rai

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! My son has the other brand hat we’re 3-times more money, it’s tough to tell the difference. His has a nice case, and the JBL are not quite as quality feeling, but they are great and well worth the money. Sound quality is amazing, unless you are an over the top sound snob, you will be happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Kevmar

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best deal you can ever have
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great! Comfortable, sound excellent, battery lasts long and has nice isolation. The only complain I can have is that it makes small static noise when played through Bluetooth with REALLY low volume. At medium to high volume the static noise can't be heard even for sensitive people like me. When listening through the cable it has no problem though.
customer_reviews.author: GuySayer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: A great headset! It looks very stylish and modern. The sound is superior, and the headset feels great! My only complaint is that I'd like a bigger ear cup. If you increase the size of that, everyone's ears won't hurt after awhile of listening. In the end, I really am enjoying these headphones. Snag the deal while you can!
customer_reviews.author: Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these particular headphones at Walmart prior to buying so I knew what kind of sound quality I was getting. What I didn't know was how comfortable they would be for long term use. The rotating speakers make the fit so comfortable! The band doesn't squeeze your head either! I love these in every aspect! If you're on the fence, do it! Product price is affordable and competitive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I like the headphones so far. No complaints. Listening to music is great and I have used them to talk through as well and I could clearly hear and the person could clearly hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one of the better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: These sound great for the price and sound as good as my Bose headphones which I paid a lot more. Nice bass and very good detail on the high notes, just as I like. You won't find any better under $200.00.
customer_reviews.author: Earl R. Bousquet

customer_reviews.title: Lackluster Performance
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after reading a number of reviews here, but I retuned as the sound did not impress me. Found others for not much more $$ that had far better sound. I would pass.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard Cow

customer_reviews.title: Cracked x2 and Left Ear Goes Out
customer_reviews.text: The earphones cracked in 2 spots. On the left and right side were the ear muffs connect to the overhead bad, within one month of use. The left ear continually goes out, the issue started to occur after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: Got my daughter a pair and wife liked so much i got her a pair I have used them, super comfortable Wish i had gotten my self these instead of the Marshalls i got ...
customer_reviews.author: M. Goerke

customer_reviews.title: E50bt was much better
customer_reviews.text: The headphones feel really flimsy and the bass levels are not even close to as good as the old e50bt this model replaced. Still very loud but without the loud bass it kind of defeats the purpose
customer_reviews.author: sean briggs

customer_reviews.title: Not with it
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money you pay. I have purchased presumably lesser quality earphones that have served the purpose way better and have much better sound quality. I wouldn't recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were perfect. Great sound quality. Very comfy....., but broke within the first year. Nothing mechanical so it wasn't able to be replaced. The moveable earpiece broke off..... Probably from being in my G-son's backpack, but still.....
customer_reviews.author: Candace Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tested these fully yet, seemed to be well built. I'm not looking for a set to rupture my eardrums so these seem to be perfect. The Bass is not overbearing and highs seem a bit flat, but acceptable. BT seem to hookup to both ipad and galaxy with no problems. Overall they're worth the money.Geart
customer_reviews.author: Roy E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, good audio, great quiality
customer_reviews.text: This product has been amazing, it is comfortable and fits any head. The audio and bluetooth connection are really reliable. However it can become a bit uncomfortable after using for over two hours, but realistically that happens with any headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Negron

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - AVOID
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones in September, and by December they has already started cracking on both sides ! So disappointing as I treat them with real care and always keep them in a protective case. I reached out to the seller who responded, "I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your headphones. Unfortunately, your purchase date exceeds our generous return policy - sorry." Wow.
customer_reviews.author: Helene T

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift For My Husband
customer_reviews.text: My Husband Absolutely Loved These Headphones. He Said The Sound Is Great, Noise Canceling Is Very Convenient, They Are Very Comfortable And Very Easily To Tuck Away
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY R BROWN

customer_reviews.title: I may have received used ones
customer_reviews.text: It is suspected to have been repackaged, which means that I may have received the used one. The sealing glue is very dirty and seems to have been used many times
customer_reviews.author: William  Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Sound is better than competition.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable on the ears. Sound rivals other big name brands. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Vergin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: The JBL's were recommended to me because I could not see myself buying a pair of beats - and I fell in love with them. They give great sound, are durable, and have a great quality of battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Works and Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on black friday for $60, very worth it at that price. My music is clear and can tell my equalizer works with the bass. It is still worth the $100 price point
customer_reviews.author: Colin Hortman

customer_reviews.title: Spend a lil more and get JBL. You'll thank yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice looks good. Sound is pretty awesome. Wear these at the gym everyday. Held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Carroll

customer_reviews.title: They need to fit tightly to avoid falling off do to movement, wear time is a few hrs
customer_reviews.text: My only guff is long term wearing as they need to be tight so as to not fall off
customer_reviews.author: jeff barron

customer_reviews.title: Nine out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Battery last a very long time connects great with Bluetooth and sounds amazing with Bluetooth. I would not recommend for the gym since they become annoying on your ear when you sweat. I give them a 9 out of 10 from my experience with headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent inexpensive headphones
customer_reviews.text: Was, for the gym there were little too big on my head but they're great for watching TV and just wondering around the house very affordable with highly recommend. They also get excellent battery life
customer_reviews.author: DivaClair

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Light and long battery life . sounds good not great .but after allbit was $100
customer_reviews.author: Vincy

customer_reviews.title: Balanced sound with just the right amount of bass.
customer_reviews.text: These are very solid headphones for the money. They aren't overly bassy like most of the other headphones I would see at Walmart at its price range. You can hear everything in excellent detail. Comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Foster

customer_reviews.title: Do these things ever need charged??
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good sound, good fit... Battery last a crazy amount of time, wear at my desk around 4 hours a day, charge like twice a month
customer_reviews.author: whatever

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Battery last a long time, very versatile, great blue color [as pictured], lightweight yet comfortable to wear even with glasses
customer_reviews.author: sarah  lekin

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth won't connect
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth won't connect to anything I have here; laptop or two Samsung cell phones. Guess I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Anne Masterson

customer_reviews.title: JBL headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great. They have great range, I was able to move throughout the house and lose signal. Battery life is great, I have yet to drain them. I've been using them for two days so far. Off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best of it’s class
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality, crystal clear vocals and nice bass, no distortion even at max volume, and amazing battery life, would definetly recommend, great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Got defective item two times!
customer_reviews.text: We got a defective item and asked for a replacement. However, when we got the replacement, it’s another defective item. So we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: M Chen

customer_reviews.title: Cool headphone!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived early than expected. Good quality sound. The fit is a little bit tight but overall it was OK! Thanks Amazon! 👌
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning these for the second time. They don't turn on ... very poor value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these! He wears them every time he mows the lawn. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret W.

customer_reviews.title: daughters present
customer_reviews.text: present for daughter and she loves them and loves the wireless part
customer_reviews.author: skeri

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones in price range better than a lot of the more expensive sets.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these headphones. They sound amazing and I can wear them for hour an no discomfort at all.
customer_reviews.author: Turbo TSI

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality good but less bass
customer_reviews.text: Voice sound is impressive. but bass quality is not good below average. Overall design is good.
customer_reviews.author: Roknuzzaman

customer_reviews.title: Product failed to deliver
customer_reviews.text: Product was not delivered and unable to get a replacement, refund has been issued promptly but bummed out
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: With they had a storage case. Besides that I have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: colleen warren

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and blocks out most noise. Use them on flights a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for! Quick shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck! And it shipped quicker than expected..
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ever have been using for Tv for years hope last a while
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Apparently they work great and holds up pretty well so far
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my kid and he loves them. Apparently they work great and holds up pretty well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Henry

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones
customer_reviews.text: All around solid headset for the gym and regular use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them, excellent sound, endless battery. No complain at all. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bibiana Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with these headphones. The sound is crisp and clear, and the bass is rumbling. In comparison to the other headphones in this price range, I think the JBLs are second to none.
customer_reviews.author: W. S. Walcott
